content: are about 13cms long when stretched out before felting & about 7cms long after felting abbreviations this pattern is written using british crochet abbreviations double_crochet double_crochet us single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet half treble us half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet treble_crochet treble us double_crochet - double_crochet chain chain chain-space chain space psm place stitch marker msm move stitch marker rsm remove stitch marker rs right side ws wrong side slip_stitch slip_stitch yrh yarn round hook decrease us decrease - insert hook in next st yrh draw through loop x 2 yrh draw loop through all 3 loops on hook dc3tog us sc3tog - insert hook in next st yrh draw through loop x 3 yrh draw loop through all 4 loops on hook dc4tog us sc4tog - insert hook in next st yrh draw through loop x 4 yrh draw loop through all 5 loops on hook ss2tog us ss2tog - insert hook in next st yrh draw through loop x twice draw last loop through all loops on hook page 2 copyright © 2008 fiona kelly make for yourself but do not sell do not copy and distribute or sell this pattern thanks for respecting copyright any queries email me at creative textiles@btinternet com & see more of my designs at http //fionakelly wordpress com/ foot base make 4 body continued make either a magic magic_ring or work 3ch & slip_stitch into first chain to form a ring work in rounds round 10 2dc 2dc in next st 8dc x 2 2dc in with rs facing & the use of a stitch marker will next st 9dc 2dc in next st 8dc 2dc in next st be helpful x 2 2dc msm 57sts round1 8dc into ring psm 8sts round 11 2dc 2dc in next st 9dc x 2 2dc round2 2dc in each of 8dc msm 16sts in next st x 2 9dc 2dc in next st x 2 9dc round3 2dc 2dc in next st x 2 2dc in next st x 2 2dc msm 65sts * 1dc 1ch 1dc in next st 2dc in next st* rept round 12 2dc 10dc 2dc in next st x 2 from *to* twice more 2dc 2dc in next st 1dc 17dc 2dc in next st 10dc x 2 2dc msm msm 28sts 69sts round4 2dc 2dc in next st 2dc x 2 1dc rounds 13 - 20 double_crochet around msm 69sts 6dc in chain-space dc4tog x 2 6dc in chain-space 1dc round 21 6dc decrease 9dc x 5 decrease 6dc 2dc 2dc in next st x 2 1dc msm 41sts msm 63sts round5 1dc 2dc 2dc in next st x 2 7dc 4dc rounds 22 - 26 double_crochet around msm 63sts in next st 1dc dc4tog 1dc 3dc in next st 1dc round 27 10dc decrease 8dc x 5 3dc msm dc4tog 1dc 4dc in next st 7dc 2dc in next st 58sts 2dc 2dc in next st 1dc rsm slip_stitch in top of 1st double_crochet rounds 28 & 29 double_crochet around
